AuthorizationChannels.description:
Authentique los requests incluyendo el [Bearer Token](../docs/authentication.md) en el `Authorization` request header.

Ej:

```http
GET /accounts
host: api.bam.com.gt
Accept: application/json
Authorization: {{ACCESS_TOKEN}}
```
